pages.text: Beyshak (bil-yaqeen)insane sir ta sir nuqsan mein hay
Siwaey un logon kay jo eman laey aur nek amal kiey aur(jinhon nay)apas mein haq ki waseeyat ki aur aik doosry ko sabar ki naseehat ki
Bari kharabi hai her aisy shaks ki jo aib tatolney wala geebat kerney wala ho
Jo maal ko jama kerta jaey or ginta jaey
Woh samjhta hy kay uska maal usky pass sada rahay ga
Hergiz nahi yeh to zaroor tor phor denay wali aag mein phenk diya jaeyga
Aur tujhey kia maloom kay asi aag kiya hogi
Woh Allah Taalaa ki sulgai hoi aag hogi
Jo dilon per charhti chali jaey gi
Who unn per her taraf say band ki hui hogi
Sab tareef Allah Taalaa kay liye hai jo tamam jahanon ka palney wala hai
Bara meharban nihayat reham kerney wala
Badlay kay din (yani qayamat) ka maalik hai

Hum sirf teri hi ibadat kertay hain aur sirf tujh hi say madad chahatay hain Shuroo Allah kay naam say jo bara meharban nehayat reham kerney wala hai 105.1. Kia tu nay na dekha kay tery rab nay hathi walon kay sath kia kiya? 105.2. Kia unkay maker ko beykar nai kerdia? 105.3. Aur unper parindon kay jhond kay jhond bhej diey 105.4. Jo unhein mitti or pather ki kankariyan mar rahy thy
Pus unhein khaye huye bhoosy ki tarah kerdiya
